data.title: Urbano - Fun. food and paint when you want it!
data.text: I am at Urbano 2 - 3 times per month enjouing Paint Nite.  We have also attended a comedy show there.  It is a great bistro and the food fantastic!! (Nasty Burger my fav)  The staff is attentive and friendly and this is a great place to spend an evening!

data.title: Great Location
data.text: Location is great, inviting , clean food nice presentation but if you have the wait staff and the bar staff both doing their studies on their laptops and you are being ignored and not being waited on and being the only person in the restaurant for lunch it should tell the owner chef something is wrong why the place is empty

data.title: Lunch
data.text: The food was very flavorful, nicely displayed and the wait staff was friendly. Located near the courthouse in downtown Modesto, Urbano is run by the folks who used to run Jacob's Fine Dining on McHenry Avenue. Looking forward to them opening up the new Jacob's Fine Dining in downtown Modesto!

data.title: Slowest wait for food to arrive ever!
data.text: I went for lunch with two friends and there were only 4 other people in the restaurant.  We had a simple order, two veggie burgers with garlic fries and one hamburger with a side salad.  We waited 30 minutes for our food to be served and then my friend who requested "no grilled onions on my burger" was served her burger with grilled onions!  My veggie burger was supposed to have grilled onions but they were still crunchy, not truly grilled. The food was just ok, definately not up to par for a $10 veggie burger!  I won't go back at lunch time because I was late getting back to work due to the snail-slow service. Now I understand why this restaurant is never busy during lunch hour, way too slow!  I do want to say that our waiter was very attentive and we were happy with the service he provided.  I think the problem is in the kitchen!
